metadata.title: CVE-2014-1887 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The DrinkedIn BarFinder application for Android, when Adobe PhoneGap 2.9.0or earlier is used, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScriptcode, and consequently obtain sensitive fine-geolocation information, byleveraging control over one of a number of adult sites, as demonstrated by(1) freelifetimecheating.com and (2) www.babesroulette.com.

criterions.comment: cordova-ubuntu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
